casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. BILLY NARAY EVANS, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 6500A DATED this 28th day of February, 1975.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of 40 years imposed on November 12th, 1974, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank Ralph Randono, Attorney at Law, for his assistance to the defendant and to this court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack D. Shanstrom, Chairman; Jack L. Green, Robert C. Sykes.
